list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "tests" WITH KEY="$GlobalFilter" WHERE $timeFilter
list.label: Filter values
list.name: GlobalFilter_values
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "tests" WITH KEY="$GlobalFilter" WHERE $timeFilter

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "requests" WITH KEY="name" WHERE "$GlobalFilter" =~ /^${GlobalFilter_values:regex}$/ AND $timeFilter
list.label: name
list.name: name
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "requests" WITH KEY="name" WHERE "$GlobalFilter" =~ /^${GlobalFilter_values:regex}$/ AND $timeFilter
